content.html: It infuriates me every time I see Lunduke make ignorant remarks when it comes to LGBTQ+, racial prejudice, and his own white male privileges. Nevertheless, discrimination on religious beliefs is also wrong and his right to call it out should be protected irregardless.
content.value:
It infuriates me every time I see Lunduke make ignorant remarks when it comes to LGBTQ+, racial prejudice, and his own white male privileges.

Nevertheless, discrimination on religious beliefs is also wrong and his right to call it out should be protected irregardless.
